original_title: Enrique Iglesias - Live AT The Isle Of MTV Malta
overview: Grammy award winning, global pop superstar IGLESIAS will be returning to the Isle of MTV stage for the first time since 2008 to perform tracks from his brand new album, SEX AND LOVE (SEXO Y AMOR) â€“ his third album to debut in the Top 10 Billboard chart after Euphoria and Escape.
title: Enrique Iglesias - Live AT The Isle Of MTV Malta
